thread.title: 30 killed in turkey capital by 2 explosions !!
thread.title_full: 30 killed in turkey capital by 2 explosions !!

title: 30 killed in turkey capital by 2 explosions !!
text: ZOLLAR said: loose cannon said: Not good ! Poor innocent people as per usual... Final nail in the coffin for turkey as a holiday destination Just seen the video, quite awful.I'm inclined to agree, I've been to Turkey twice in the last 7-8 years and always thought I'd go back but things like this certainly do make me think twice. I suppose they are located near to Syria and various jihadists but I still tend to think it's like not going to Devon because of terrorist attacks in London.
